statements: SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC, product_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC, supplier_id ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = 101 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id IN (101, 103, 105) ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 20 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE products.quantity > 50
SELECT product_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 2
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name FROM supplier WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, supplier_id FROM product_supplier WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_supplier;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM product ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM supplier WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product.product_name, supplier.supplier_name FROM product INNER JOIN supplier ON product.supplier_id = supplier.supplier_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products WHERE supplier_id IS NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id FROM Products WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, o.quantity_ordered, o.order_date FROM Orders o JOIN Products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity_available, i.last_update FROM Products p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.quantity_available < 10;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN products ON transactions.product_id = products.product_id WHERE quantity_sold >= 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
